inclusion.criterion: Mild to moderate calcific AS of a tricuspid or bicuspid aortic valve
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Echocardiographic derived mean pressure gradient >10 mmHg and an aortic valve area of 0.9 to 1.7 cm2 by continuity equation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of LDL-c>70 mg/dl within 12 months prior to recruitment.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Valvular area of 0.9 cm2 and a mean gradient >30 mmHg
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He also has bicuspid aortic valve, dilated ascending aorta, and mild pulmonary artery systolic hypertension.
